title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Web 2.0-Based Mathematics Reading, Writing, and Literacy Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can produce written materials explaining mathematical concepts with over 80% accuracy using Web 2.0 tools (blogs, wikis, collaboration platforms).
Learners can analyze peers' mathematical problem-solving processes and provide feedback through online discussions and peer reviews.
Learners can document and present the process of creatively solving real-world mathematical problems through Web 2.0-based project outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
